des:
"Drinking Trivia" is an Alexa Skill designed to test your knowledge while adding a fun, party game vibe! Answer with "yes" or "no" to trivia questions and find out who scores the highest—or who ends up drinking the most! Perfect for gatherings, game nights, or just a casual good time with friends.

🎉 SINGLE PLAYER MODE 🎉

• Show your smarts: Answer entertaining questions with a simple "yes" or "no."
• Earn points: Score 1 point for every correct answer.
• Check your progress: Say "stop" at any time to hear your total score.
• Milestone updates: After every 10 questions, Alexa will share your current score.

🎉 MULTIPLAYER MODE 🎉

• Compete with friends or family! Up to 4 players can join in on the fun.
• Score updates: Every 20 questions, Alexa reveals the leaderboard.
• Hydration twist: The player with the lowest score will be "reminded" to hydrate responsibly. 😄

✨ EXCITING UPGRADES ✨

• Learn as you go: Receive a detailed explanation for every incorrect answer—expand your trivia knowledge!
• Need a do-over? Simply say "repeat," and Alexa will repeat the question for you.

🎭 SPECIAL FEATURE 🎭

A dose of humor: The player with the most wrong answers will get a cheeky remark from Alexa at the end. Prepare to laugh and toast to the moment!
Show off your trivia skills, bond over some laughs, and crown the ultimate trivia master—or drink master! 🍹

🍺 PLAY, LAUGH, AND DRINK RESPONSIBLY! 🍺

*This skill is intended for an adult audience.
